QuestData.Title: Desolation Hold Inspection
QuestData.Description: Thanks to you, the immediate threat is over. But my work here in the Barrens is only beginning.$B$BHonor's Stand was captured and Taurajo was sacked while Warlord Gar'dul was in charge of the region. The Warchief has sent me here to clean up his mess.$B$BI would like you to ride into Desolation Hold to the south in advance of me and let Gar'dul know that it is time for a reckoning.$B$BTalk to me when you are ready to leave and I will assemble my vanguard to accompany you.
QuestData.LogDescription: Talk to Warlord Bloodhilt, then ride into Desolation Hold and inform Gar'dul that Warlord Bloodhilt is on his way.
QuestData.CompletionText: What is this about? Why are you creating such a commotion in my camp?
QuestData.RewardText: <Gar'dul breaks into a sweat.>$B$BLook - ah - let's not discuss this here, in front of the men...
